title: Generate video content summary with Amazon Bedrock
description: Meeting recordings uploaded through a UI trigger an AWS event, leading to transcription by Amazon Transcribe and summarization using AI21 Lab's Jurassic-2 Ultra model, with results stored in DynamoDB and accessible via the UI.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The AWS Step Functions state machine orchestrates the transcoding for videos using AWS Elemental MediaConvert. Users upload videos through a user-friendly interface hosted on an S3 bucket and delivered via Amazon CloudFront. When a video is uploaded, an event in the AWS account triggers Amazon EventBridge, capturing the event. The system then proceeds to transcode the video for Amazon Transcribe or directly feeds it if it's already compatible. Both the transcoding and Amazon Bedrock workflow are orchestrated by the AWS Step Functions state machine. For additional information, please refer to the GitHub repository.
